ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, ketchup, and mustard for serving
directions: Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
In a large bowl, mix together ground beef, salt, and black pepper. Form into 4 equal patties.
Grill patties for 4-5 minutes per side, until fully cooked. During the last minute of cooking, top each patty with a slice of cheese.
Serve burgers on toasted buns with desired toppings.
In a large bowl, whisk together buttermilk and hot sauce. Add chicken pieces and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or up to overnight.
In a shallow dish, whisk together flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Remove chicken from buttermilk mixture, allowing excess to drip off. Dredge chicken in flour mixture, pressing to adhere.
Heat about 1 inch of vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Working in batches, fry chicken until golden brown and fully cooked, about 6-8 minutes per side.
Transfer chicken to a paper towel-lined plate to drain excess oil. Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 375째F.
Cook macaroni according to package directions, until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Gradually whisk in milk and heavy cream, stirring constantly, until mixture comes to a simmer and thickens slightly. Stir in salt and black pepper.
Remove from heat and stir in cheddar and Parmesan cheeses until melted and smooth.
Stir in cooked macaroni until well coated with cheese sauce. Transfer mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Sprinkle breadcrumbs over

ingredients: 2 lbs Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and diced
directions: In a large pot, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add onion, celery, and garlic to the bacon fat and cook until softened.
Sprinkle flour over the vegetables and stir to coat. Cook for 1-2 minutes, until flour is lightly browned.
Gradually whisk in clam juice, heavy cream, bay leaves, and thyme. Bring to a simmer and add potatoes.
Simmer until potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Stir in minced clams and reserved bacon. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped parsley.
Preheat oven to 300째F.
Season ribs with garlic powder, onion powder, smoked paprika, chili powder, and cayenne pepper.
Wrap ribs tightly in foil and bake for 2-3 hours, until tender.
Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Remove ribs from foil and brush with barbecue sauce. Grill for 3-4 minutes per side, until slightly charred and glazed with sauce.
Serve hot.

ingredients: 1/2 cup unsalted butter, chilled and cubed
directions: Preheat oven to 425째F.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, salt, and baking soda.
Using a pastry cutter or your fingers, cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Add buttermilk and stir until dough comes together.
Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead lightly. Roll out to 1/2 inch thickness and cut with a biscuit cutter.
Place biscuits on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 12-15 minutes, until golden brown

ingredients: Lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles for serving
directions: Divide ground beef into 4 equal portions and shape into patties. Season with salt and pepper on both sides.
Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Grill burgers for 3-4 minutes per side, or until desired doneness is reached.
Top each patty with a slice of American cheese and allow to melt.
Assemble burgers on toasted buns with lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles. Serve with ketchup and mustard.
In a shallow bowl, whisk together flour, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
In another shallow bowl, whisk together buttermilk and eggs.
Dredge chicken pieces in the flour mixture, then dip in the buttermilk mixture, and then coat in the flour mixture again.
Heat about 2 inches of vegetable oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat.
Working in batches, fry chicken pieces for 10-12 minutes per side, until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove chicken to a wire rack to drain excess oil.
Serve hot.
Preheat oven to 375째F.
Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Whisk in flour and cook for 1-2 minutes, until lightly browned.
Gradually whisk in milk and bring to a simmer. Cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring constantly, until thickened.
Stir in cheddar, mozzarella, and Parmesan cheeses until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add cooked macaroni to the cheese sauce and stir to combine
